titleStmt.title: A Full and perticular [sic] relation of that strange, horrible, and (in England) unheard-of murther, vvhich was committed on the body of the late famous Dr. Clench, in an hackney-coach, near Leaden-Hall-Market, on Monday-night the 4th of this instant Jan. 1692

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
